allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(cetus\): add dynamic token discovery with error handling

- Implement dynamic token list loading from Cetus on-chain registry
- Add error states and loading indicators for token list
- Add warning message for token pairs without available pools
- Optimize pool lookup with static config fast path
- Improve type safety by removing ''as any'' assertions
- Fix React useEffect dependencies with functional updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
